<title level="1" right="Action">[Attack of Opportunity](/Actions.aspx?ID=8) <actions string="Reaction" /></title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 142 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Trigger** A creature within your reach uses a [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104) action or a [move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114) action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square during a move action it’s using.

</column>

---

You lash out at a foe that leaves an opening. Make a melee Strike against the triggering creature. If your attack is a critical hit and the trigger was a manipulate action, you [disrupt](/Rules.aspx?ID=394) that action. This Strike doesn’t count toward your multiple attack penalty, and your multiple attack penalty doesn’t apply to this Strike.
name: Attack of Opportunity
